channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Directional road sign on corner of Bath Rd & A40 has been damaged and the bottom left corner is protruding onto the pavement in a very dangerous manner, 2nd February
item.description:
On Bath Road at the junction of Bath Road & A40. Sign is on Bath Road (W) on the corner by the old HSBC offices at 109-111 Bath Rd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clare Place, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A Highway Grip Digging Contractor, has damaged a highway headwalldrain, 2nd February
item.description:
During the last few days, a verge grip digging contractor, has damaged a KEY HIGHWAY DRAIN HEADWALL. On a temporary basis, I have manually lifted and re-assembled the damaged headwall. With a vulnerable residence situated around 15m upstream, the interim measure was essential
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose and cracked slabs outside 18 All Saints Road, 2nd February
item.description:
Uneven, Loose and cracked slabs outside 18 All Saints Road. This is an ongoing issue and has been getting worse with additional slabs becoming loose.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, All Saints' Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Few pot holes ranging in width and depth over 1metre in length getting worse, 2nd February

On road outside 135 Hatherley Road. Been there since Christmas gradually getting worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 142, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Sunken gas cover outside 2 Malvern View, 2nd February
item.description:
The tarmac around the gas cover is damaged and the cover sunken, causing noise and vibration in the property as vehicles travel over it. I cannot report this as an emergency (sunken cover), as the telephone number provided is currently unavailable!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are too many potholes to mention, they are all over the place and with cars continually parked they are difficult to avoid, the whole road needs resurfacing it is a disgrace, 2nd February
item.description:
22 to 30 Salamanca Road, the potholes are everywhere the whole road needs resurfacing, on the lower numbered houses as you turn in from Imjin road have some white paint around them but so many there also not painted
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Salamanca Road, Oakley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Permanent roadworks, 2nd February
item.description:
Wanted to ask on progress on this roadworks. I pass it a lot and have never seen anyone working on it. Just seems to be permanent temporary lights. Enquiring on a completion date. Thanks you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 267a, London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken and missing raised curb panels along the railing, 1st February
item.description:
Along the raised curb by the railing e.g. in front of numbers 79, 81, 83, 85 and 87 Ryeworth Road the raised curb under the railings is broken, loose or missing. If it falls in to the road it could be very dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Ryeworth Road, Cheltenham
